trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSA808_00792_SEQ_00<tab>Aeluuin of the Bobbing Cork would ask you to help with housekeeping.

TEXT_GAIUSA808_00792_SEQ_01<tab>Aeluuin's employees are shirking their duties of late, and the paintings that adorn the inn are collecting dust. Borrow the innkeep's chocobo duster and restore the masterpieces to a pristine state.
TEXT_GAIUSA808_00792_SEQ_02<tab>Caked in dust not minutes ago, the paintings' vivid colors now shine through. Tell Aeluuin your job is done.

TEXT_GAIUSA808_00792_SEQ_03<tab>Aeluuin is pleased to see his paintings spic-and-span again. Though he is quite partial to one of the paintings, he has thus far been unable to ascertain the artist's identity.
TEXT_GAIUSA808_00792_TODO_00<tab>Use the chocobo duster on the paintings.
TEXT_GAIUSA808_00792_AELUUIN_000_000<tab>You see that painting over there? Well, of course you can't─it's covered in a fortnight's worth of dust thanks to my do-nothing employees!

TEXT_GAIUSA808_00792_AELUUIN_000_001<tab>I'd dust them right off myself, but I reckon the sluggards would better learn their lesson if they saw a customer like yourself doing the deed. What do you say? A few swishes with this chocobo duster should do the trick, and I'll make it worth your while.
TEXT_GAIUSA808_00792_AELUUIN_000_020<tab>Thanks, friend. <sigh> If only my employees shared the love of fine art that you and I do, eh?

TEXT_GAIUSA808_00792_AELUUIN_000_021<tab>The painting upstairs, especially─don't ask me why, but the lonesome figure standing there, gazing off into the distance... I'm not usually the sentimental type, but it stirs something inside me.

TEXT_GAIUSA808_00792_AELUUIN_000_022<tab>Is he wistfully remembering adventures long past? Or steeling his nerves for a battle to come? Sadly, what with the artist's identity a mystery, we might never know.
